content.text: Cognitive entropy measures the level of order or disorder within knowledge: Lower entropy corresponds to stable, well-defined states (Ψᴷ) Higher entropy indicates less defined states (Ψʰ).

additional_metrics.text: Cognitive entropy measures the level of order or disorder within knowledge: Lower entropy corresponds to stable, well-defined states (Ψᴷ) Higher entropy indicates less defined states (Ψʰ).
